metadata.title: CVE-2020-12387 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition when running shutdown code for Web Worker led to ause-after-free vulnerability. This resulted in a potentially exploitablecrash. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 68.8, Firefox < 76, andThunderbird < 68.8.0.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
